name: Please Remember (Annsswer)
description:
Play in 'Fullscreen Mode' to avoid any weird mouse wheel behavioural problems

You’re a student who has just failed their final exam. 

You will now travel back in time exactly 2 weeks (14 days) before the start of the exam. 

  1. Complete tasks to increase your intelligence and reclaim your dignity
  2. Be careful of becoming too bored, as you may end up procrastinating against your will. 
  3.  Manage your time wisely in order to win.
  4.  Your deadline is next Friday.

Features music from Couple N:

♫ Spotify : https://open.spotify.com/artist/6Yryg... 

♫ Youtube : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEKW... 

♫ Soundcloud : https://soundcloud.com/couple-n-music 

♫ Bandcamp :https://couple-n.bandcamp.com/ 

♫ Twitter : https://twitter.com/couplenmusic
